mapper.select: select invitation_id, name, enterprise_id, department_id, rose_id, regime_ids, url, state, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from ecmp.ecmp_enterprise_invitation_info where invitation_id = #{invitationId}

select invitation_id, name, enterprise_id, department_id, rose_id, regime_ids, url, state, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from ecmp.ecmp_enterprise_invitation_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into ecmp.ecmp_enterprise_invitation_info(name, enterprise_id, department_id, rose_id, regime_ids, url, state, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{name}, #{enterpriseId}, #{departmentId}, #{roseId}, #{regimeIds}, #{url}, #{state}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update ecmp.ecmp_enterprise_invitation_info
name = #{name},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
department_id = #{departmentId},
rose_id = #{roseId},
regime_ids = #{regimeIds},
url = #{url},
state = #{state},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where invitation_id = #{invitationId}
